p: You really shouldn't have, but I'm glad you did, because I do like nice mufflers. ANd the kimona for the Ceremonial Knife is a dandy! Numerous thanks! Bless you both!
Maybe we can't get away until about Feb 1. I'd like it if we could stay until spring shows up.
I'm pretty sure you didn't misinterpret my former letter about the proposed visit. We're eager to come & look at you.
Don't teeter that basket Enot Peanot! We want to hug that Wub and make it bawl.
